rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with Scandinavian minimalist style, complemented by clean lines and warm natural wood finishes. It includes a central courtyard view.
An open-plan living area designed to maximize space with ample natural light, featuring built-in Scandinavian furniture and a large window facing the courtyard.
A semi-open dining space integrated with the living area, featuring minimalist Scandinavian decor and a view of the central courtyard.
A modern kitchen designed in Scandinavian style with functional layout, ample storage, and energy-efficient appliances. Features an island that can double as a dining or work area.
A landscaped courtyard providing a serene outdoor living space, incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow and natural ventilation. Suitable for relaxation and family gatherings.
The master bedroom designed in Scandinavian style with minimalist interiors and ample storage solutions. Features a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom.
A secondary bedroom designed to be functional with Scandinavian simplicity, suitable for additional family members or guests.
Another private room maintaining a modern Scandinavian aesthetic, ensuring privacy and comfort.
An en-suite master bathroom featuring minimalist design with essential fixtures, integrated seamlessly into the bedroom.
A secondary full bathroom located centrally to serve multiple bedrooms and common areas.

openings.description: A large, energy-efficient glass door leading from the entrance hall to the central courtyard, designed for ample natural light and ventilation.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living area and bedrooms ensuring optimal daylight and scenic views of the courtyard.

disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: This design is conceptual and should be reviewed by a certified architect to ensure compliance with local building norms, Vastu principles, and practical usability.
